alert.note: Alert for Adair; Dallas; Guthrie; Madison (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 8:42PM CDT until April 19 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Madison County in south central Iowa... Southeastern Guthrie County in west central Iowa... Central Adair County in southwestern Iowa... Southern Dallas County in central Iowa... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 841 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles south of Stuart, or 11 miles northeast of Greenfield, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Stuart around 850 PM CDT. Earlham, Dexter and Diamondhead Lake around 855 PM CDT. Redfield around 900 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include De Soto, Adel and Dallas Center. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 81 and 111. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central, south central, southwestern and west central Iowa.
